article.title: Raytheon Receives $30 Million for SLAMRAAM Long-Lead Production
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Raytheon Company's Surface Launched Medium Range Air-to-Air Missile (SLAMRAAM) program has received U.S. Army approval for a long-lead acquisition, not to exceed $30 million, for long-lead purchases leading to low-rate initial production.
